targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  uri!="/health", uri!="/metrics"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  uri!="/health", uri!="/metrics"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, uri, status))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="dns_done"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client)) - histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="dns_start"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="tls_handshake_done"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client)) - histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="tls_handshake_start"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="got_conn"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client)) - histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", event="get_conn"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="conn_done"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client)) - histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="conn_start"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="got_first_resp_byte"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client)) - histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="got_conn"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="wrote_request"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client)) - histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_event_seconds_bucket{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service="$service", container=~"$container", event="got_conn"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, client))

sum(rate(cache_total{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  metric="hit_count"})[$__rate_interval]) by (store) / (sum(rate(cache_total{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  metric="hit_count"})[$__rate_interval]) by (store) + sum(rate(cache_total{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  metric="miss_count"})[$__rate_interval]) by (store))

sum(increase(cache_total{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  metric="miss_count"})[$__rate_interval]) by (store) / (sum(increase(cache_total{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  metric="hit_count"})[$__rate_interval]) by (store) + sum(increase(cache_total{source_cluster=~"$cluster", service=~"$service", container=~"$container",  metric="miss_count"})[$__rate_interval]) by (store))
